title: OT109: Opulent Thread
summary:
Key ideas:
- The blog post is an open thread allowing readers to post about anything they want.
- Updates on the Adversarial Collaboration Contest and comments of the week are discussed.
- The author unbanned various users and thanks those who have hosted and attended SSC meetups.
- There is a pre-registration for an informal experiment on CO2.

Key learnings:
- There are multiple open threads on the website, including hidden ones.
- The Adversarial Collaboration Contest has four entries and the deadline has passed.
- Skef may need to register an alternate account due to a missing ban.
- SSC meetups are being held and can be found on the meetups page.
- There is an ongoing informal experiment on CO2.

Key questions:
- Did the author miss any Adversarial Collaboration Contest entries?
- Can Skef comment on the website and, if not, how can they resolve the issue?
- How successful have recent SSC meetups been?
